SELECT A.*, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(RULE_TRIGGER_TYPE || ';' || RULE_ID || ';' || RULE_NAME)) FROM (SELECT C.*, B.RULESET_ID, B.RULE_TRIGGER_TYPE FROM CFG_DYNC_RULESET_RULE B, CFG_DYNC_RULE C WHERE B.RULE_ID = C.RULE_ID AND B.STATE = 1 AND C.STATE = 1 ORDER BY B.SORT_ID) X WHERE X.RULESET_ID = A.RULESET_ID) RULES, (SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(RULE_ID)) FROM (SELECT C.*, B.RULESET_ID FROM CFG_DYNC_RULESET_RULE B, CFG_DYNC_RULE C WHERE B.RULE_ID = C.RULE_ID AND B.STATE = 1 AND C.STATE = 1 ORDER BY B.SORT_ID) X WHERE X.RULESET_ID = A.RULESET_ID) RULESID FROM CFG_DYNC_RULESET A WHERE A.STATE = 1
AND a.ruleset_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param.rulesetName}),'%')
order by a.RULESET_ID
